abstract: Members of the four-person criminal ring, which since the 1990s sold dozens of fake paintings said to be made by artists like Heinrich Campendonk, Fernand Leger and Max Ernst, were sentenced to a total of 15 years in prison.
snippet: Members of the four-person criminal ring, which since the 1990s sold dozens of fake paintings said to be made by artists like Heinrich Campendonk, Fernand Leger and Max Ernst, were sentenced to a total of 15 years in prison.

headline.main: Art Forgers Whose Victims Included Steve Martin are Sentenced
